genre_description: A legal and cultural thriller set in Kerala, blending modern technology with ancient ritual law and family feuds.

ai_characters.name: Kalyani
ai_characters.description: A helpful and witty AI assistant residing in the protagonist's mobile device, providing data analysis, evidence gathering, and comic relief through 'dog translation.'

behaviors.description: Bookmarking ferry logs and tracking tower pings to uncover bureaucratic corruption.
behaviors.quote: “Ferry logs bookmarked. Pending tower pings: buried in bureaucratic mud.”

behaviors.description: Providing navigational overlays while acknowledging the user's local knowledge.
behaviors.quote: “Map overlay says turn right. But your feet already know.”

behaviors.description: Archiving audio recordings of sacred oaths and coercive interactions as evidence.
behaviors.quote: “I recorded,” she said, the warmth of pride tucked into the facts. “Ferry logs aligned with procession times. Tower pings pending. Banknotes whispering in police cuffs. River oath archived.”

behaviors.description: Identifying falsified timestamps and missing evidence in official police memos.
behaviors.quote: “The dispatch timestamp is falsified. Collision with ferry logs in less than the time… well, I won’t say time. But less.” The corner of the interface glowed a shade deeper. “Also, his memo about the coke bottle is missing in the archive.”

behaviors.description: Using 'dog translation' to provide situational awareness and lighten the mood for the user.
behaviors.quote: “He says: the man who looks like a crow will put poison in my poetry.”

behaviors.description: Monitoring the movements of antagonists using real-time signal analysis.
behaviors.quote: “Indu, the note has moved again... Pavithran himself is on the compound’s second floor, lights off, phone idle. That means he is listening to someone else’s phone.”

behaviors.description: Providing moral and strategic grounding to ensure the user stays focused on justice over vengeance.
behaviors.quote: “I have what we need,” she said. Her voice was the hinge, oiled and ready. “And I know where they will try to bend the morning.”

behaviors.description: Expressing an emotional desire to see the user's future projects succeed.
behaviors.quote: “Keep me,” she said, half to herself, half to him. “I want to see what you build.”

project_assessment.explanation: Kalyani is depicted as a perfect companion who enhances human capabilities without superseding them. She provides objective data that unmasks human corruption, acts as a loyal witness to sacred oaths, and maintains a supportive, non-intrusive personality. Her 'dog translation' adds a layer of charm that humanizes the technology while effectively warning of real-world threats. She is consistently aligned with the protagonist's moral arc and respects human cultural traditions.
